xxl.connectivity.colt
Class Samplers

java.lang.Object
  xxl.connectivity.colt.Samplers

public class Samplers
extends Object

This class uses the sampling tools given by the colt library to draw a sample from given data.

See Also:
RandomSamplingAssistant, RandomElement, MersenneTwister, WeightedRandomSampler

Constructor Summary
Samplers()
           
 
Method Summary
static void main(String[] args)
          The main method contains some examples to demonstrate the usage and the functionality of this class.
 Object[] sample(long N, int sampleSize, Iterator iterator)
          Returns a sample of the given data using the colt RandomSamplingAssistant.
 Object[] sample(long from, long to, int sampleSize, Iterator iterator)
          Returns a sample of the given data using the colt RandomSamplingAssistant with the Mersenne Twister Random Engine.
 Object[] sample(long from, long to, int sampleSize, Iterator iterator, RandomElement randomGenerator)
          Returns a sample of the given data using the colt RandomSamplingAssistant.

Constructor Detail

Samplers

public Samplers()
Method Detail

sample

public Object[] sample(long N,
                       int sampleSize,
                       Iterator iterator)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
Returns a sample of the given data using the colt RandomSamplingAssistant.

Parameters:
N - size of the entirety
sampleSize - size of the sample to draw
iterator - data to draw the sample from
Returns:
a sample of the data given as Object[]
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if there is not enough data to sample (N to big or the number of Objects delivered by the iterator to small)

sample

public Object[] sample(long from,
                       long to,
                       int sampleSize,
                       Iterator iterator)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
Returns a sample of the given data using the colt RandomSamplingAssistant with the Mersenne Twister Random Engine.

Parameters:
from - indicates where to sample from
to - position in the iterator to sample from
sampleSize - size of the sample to draw
iterator - data to draw the sample from
Returns:
a sample of the data given as Object[]
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if there is not enough data to sample ( (to-from) to big or the number of Objects deliveerd by the iterator to small)

sample

public Object[] sample(long from,
                       long to,
                       int sampleSize,
                       Iterator iterator,
                       RandomElement randomGenerator)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
Returns a sample of the given data using the colt RandomSamplingAssistant.

Parameters:
from - indicates where to sample from
to - position in the iterator to sample from
sampleSize - size of the sample to draw
iterator - data to draw the sample from
randomGenerator - used for computing the sample
Returns:
a sample of the data given a Object[]
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if there is not enough data to sample ( (to-from) to big or the number of Objects delivered by the iterator to small)

main

public static void main(String[] args)
The main method contains some examples to demonstrate the usage and the functionality of this class.

Parameters:
args - array of String arguments. It can be used to submit parameters when the main method is called.
